text: Their enrollment, registering every male of a month or more, was six thousand two hundred.
Your hands were not bound with chains, nor your feet placed in fetters; As one falls before the wicked, you fell. And all the people continued to weep for him.

saying in the presence of his associates and the troops of Samaria: “What are these miserable Jews trying to do? Will they complete their restoration in a single day? Will they recover these stones, burnt as they are, from the heaps of dust?”
He entrusted to him half of his forces, and the elephants, and gave him instructions concerning everything he wanted done. As for the inhabitants of Judea and Jerusalem,
Since you have been scourged by Heaven, proclaim to all God’s great power.” When they had said this, they disappeared.
Those who scoff, he scoffs at, but the lowly he favors.
That someone tramples underfoot all the prisoners in the land,
Before whom the stars at their posts shine and rejoice.
For your name’s sake, do not deliver us up forever, or make void your covenant.
And looking around at those seated in the circle he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers.
the son of Jacob, the son of Isaac, the son of Abraham, the son of Terah, the son of Nahor,
For the one whom God sent speaks the words of God. He does not ration his gift of the Spirit.
